thread.title: Lord Snowdon ex-husband of Princess Margaret dies aged 86
thread.title_full: Lord Snowdon ex-husband of Princess Margaret dies aged 86

author: Sam Adams
title: Lord Snowdon ex-husband of Princess Margaret dies aged 86
text:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Lord Snowdon, the ex-husband of Princess Margaret has died aged 86. 
Snowdon, a filmmaker and photographer, married the princess in 1960 but they separated in 1978. 
He died peacefully at home, his family has revealed. 
Born Antony Charles Robert Armstrong-Jones, the 1st Earl of Snowdon, was also married for a second time to Lucy Mary Lindsay-Hogg, but the couple divorced in 2000. 
On 16 November 1999 Lord Snowdon was created Baron Armstrong-Jones, of Nymans in the County of West Sussex Lord Snowden has died at home aged 86 
We'll be bringing you the very latest updates, pictures and video on this breaking news story.
